job_details.Functieomschrijving:
* Execute demonstrations, POCs, and evaluations through coordination of the physical and human resources of Dataiku and the customer; lead the combined team to carry out the agreed upon course of action to prove that Dataiku delivers the needed value better than our competitors
     * Answer questions and provide technical guidance to the customer's technical team regarding the demonstrated or evaluated solutions
     * Assist in sales pipeline building activities including attendance at live and/or virtual trade-shows and industry conferences, working with marketing and or partners on campaign design and execution and other activities specified by sales and pre-sales management
     * Provide regular updates on your activities to support accurate regional forecasting, participate in continuous development activities that expand or build on your knowledge and skills with new product releases, GTM programs and initiatives & relevant enablement sessions, participate in departmental activities like GTM or SE offsites.
job_details.full_text:
Sales Engineer - Netherlands

* Execute demonstrations, POCs, and evaluations through coordination of the physical and human resources of Dataiku and the customer; lead the combined team to carry out the agreed upon course of action to prove that Dataiku delivers the needed value better than our competitors
     * Answer questions and provide technical guidance to the customer's technical team regarding the demonstrated or evaluated solutions
     * Assist in sales pipeline building activities including attendance at live and/or virtual trade-shows and industry conferences, working with marketing and or partners on campaign design and execution and other activities specified by sales and pre-sales management
     * Provide regular updates on your activities to support accurate regional forecasting, participate in continuous development activities that expand or build on your knowledge and skills with new product releases, GTM programs and initiatives & relevant enablement sessions, participate in departmental activities like GTM or SE offsites.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses on sales enablement, customer demonstrations, and technical guidance within a sales context, rather than core AI/ML development, engineering, or research. While it involves technical aspects related to a data science platform (Dataiku), it does not align with the core responsibilities or evidence profiles of an ML Engineer or GenAI Engineer. The role is primarily customer-facing and sales-support oriented, fitting the definition of 'Ambiguous' as it's not a technical AI development role and primarily focuses on the use of AI tools (Dataiku) to demonstrate value.

job_tasks.justification: The role involves understanding customer needs and demonstrating how the product (Dataiku) delivers value, which requires aligning technical capabilities with business objectives.
job_tasks.phrase: prove that Dataiku delivers the needed value better than our competitors

job_tasks.justification: Assisting in sales pipeline building and working with marketing/partners on campaign design are business-focused activities.
job_tasks.phrase: Assist in sales pipeline building activities

job_tasks.justification: While not building applications from scratch, the role requires technical guidance and understanding of solutions being demonstrated, which touches upon the application of software.
job_tasks.phrase: provide technical guidance to the customer's technical team regarding the demonstrated or evaluated solutions

job_tasks.justification: The role involves executing demonstrations and POCs, which requires understanding and presenting the operational aspects of the Dataiku platform.
Participating in continuous development activities and staying updated with new product releases and initiatives indicates a need for learning and adaptability.
job_tasks.phrase: participate in continuous development activities that expand or build on your knowledge and skills with new product releases, GTM programs and initiatives & relevant enablement sessions

soft_skills.phrase: Answer questions and provide technical guidance to the customer's technical team
lead the combined team to carry out the agreed upon course of action

Assist in sales pipeline building activities including attendance at live and/or virtual trade-shows and industry conferences, working with marketing and or partners on campaign design and execution and other activities specified by sales and pre-sales management
